text: An Expensive Visit is a 1915 American silent comedy film featuring Oliver Hardy. ==Cast== * Ed Lawrence - Dad * Oliver Hardy - Jack * Raymond McKee - Dick * Ben Walker - Tom * C.W. title: An Expensive Visit
